text: Nina Petrovna Trofimova (Нина Петровна Трофимова; born 1944) is a former Soviet track and road cyclist. She competed at the eight UCI Road World Championships between 1966 and 1973 and won the bronze medal in the 1969 women's road race event. She became both on the road as on the track multiple times medalist at Soviet national championships. == References == Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet cyclists
title: Nina Trofimova
